Test

Prefix
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
const int N = 112345;
int a[N];
main()
{
    string s;
    cin >> s;
    a[0] = 0;
    for(int i = 1; i < s.size(); i ++)
    {
        int j = a[i - 1];
        while(j > 0 && s[j] != s[i])
            j = a[j — 1];
        if(s[j] == s[i])
            j ++;
        a[i] = j;
    }
    for(int i = 0; i < s.size(); i ++)
    {
        cout << a[i] << "";
    }
}
Har xil qism satrlar
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
const int N = 112345;
int a[N];
main()
{
    string s, t;
    cin >> s;
    int cnt = 0;
    for(int i = s.size() — 1; i >= 0; i --)
    {
        t = s[i] + t;
        a[0] = 0;
        int mx = 0;
        for(int j = 1; j < t.size(); j ++)
        {
            int x = a[j - 1];
            while(x > 0 && t[x] != t[j])
                x = a[x — 1];
            if(t[x] == t[j])
                x ++;
            a[j] = x;
            mx = max(mx, a[j]);
        }
        cnt += (int)t.size() — mx;
    }
    cout << cnt;
}
